replies.body: Have you had any previous punishments?
Yes but i think its to much anyway, now i cant call someone troll cuz i get banned?? lol

If you've had a 25 game chat restriction, the next step is a 14 day ban
And the step after that is a perma ban

And no, you aren't allowed to flame, harass or insult people. Surprise surprise, rule breaking has consequences
How troll is an insult. ROLF

Troll isn’t an insult of course, but you have used a bit more of the “creative” language there. 
Some times people do troll, but most of the time they just don’t have a good game or they are low skilled in general. 

If your only goal is to win a game, just cheer your teammates up and never try to surrender. High morale goes a long way. 
14 days is a long time if you play every day for hours, but not that big of a deal overall. 

Permanent ban is the real threat. 

Also, Anivia supp is a viable pick. 

I know you think that it isn’t fair to get a suspension for that, you did try your best after all. The game is about gameplay, not chat, isn’t it? 
But, your teammates, whether you accept it or not, are affected by what you type in chat. 
I for one, really hate when someone flames me for dying in lane couple of times. 

I don’t want to seem condescending or anything, but the real advice here would be — to take a break and come back in couple of weeks. 

Just remember to keep your chat in check because they will ban you for a single one offense. 

In some games stakes are very high and you must stay calm to achieve your victory. 
Imagine that your teammate is a 14 years kid. You wouldn’t flame a kid for having a bad game, would you?

Best of luck bro.

Riot uses a punishment escalation system and it has 4 tiers;

1. 10 game chat restriction 
2. 25 game chat restriction 
3. 14-day ban
4. Permaban

Every time you get punished you move up the punishment  ladder. 

As you've been a repeat offender, your punishment got escalated to a ban.

Now understand that if that Anivia was really trolling, then you getting upset to this degree won't get you puished. But I can see that you have a habit of blaming others (blaming naut and we as shown in the 2nd logs). As the system doesn't punish based on severity alone but punishes based on consistency x severity, meaning you can be punished for 1 game of extreme toxicity or many many games of mild toxicity, your constant blaming others throughout many games is what caused you to be punished.
